mapper.insert: insert into resource (ID, `NAME`, `SIZE`, CONTENT_TYPE, SUFFIX, RESOURCE_TYPE, URL, TENANT_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID, PARENT_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update resource set `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `SIZE` = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CONTENT_TYPE = #{contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUFFIX = #{suffix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESOURCE_TYPE = #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, URL = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=CHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, `NAME`, `SIZE`, CONTENT_TYPE, SUFFIX, RESOURCE_TYPE, URL, TENANT_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID, PARENT_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER from resource where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ID, `NAME`, `SIZE`, CONTENT_TYPE, SUFFIX, RESOURCE_TYPE, URL, TENANT_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID, PARENT_ID, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER from resource
